Would the autoguns be able to see Scyther, who's cloaked?

::Scyther/Incarcinator/Demise::

Scyther dodges stray autogun shots as he backs up, not getting hit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Incarcinator hears Starscream's message, and turns around to see a bot heading for him. He aims his rifle, firing three very fast, and very explosive, shells at him after the bot turns to go off after someone else. An autogun shot then hits him in the side, sending him flying away from the base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise takes off at a run away from the base, shots hitting all around him. A few hit his armor, but don't do more than denting it.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> the autoguns continue to fire at the three.
